projects.title: Salesforce Sales Cloud & CPQ implementation
projects.description:
Salesforce Sales Cloud and CPQ design and implementation project to align the different product lines on their sales process and CPQ pricing quotation for a supplier of optical project screens in Denmark.
This included the delivery of a:
- New Lead Process
- New Sales Process including CPQ configuration for multiple product lines and Advanced Approvals 
Contract Management to handle their Cloud Licenses
- Account and Order Integration with AX ERP.

projects.title: Salesforce strategy study
projects.description: Customer (Automotive Financial Services) has selected Salesforce as platform of choice for many of their IT solutions. The roll-out of the Salesforce project is first to define the governance and project approach for the larger project and make some key decisions on architecture. Customer has decided to proceed and project is to start on development of an App Store, dedicated apps and installation of Copado DevOps.

projects.title: Salesforce - CRM+ Front Office
projects.description: A Salesforce Service Cloud (CRM+) development and implementation project for a global company in Consumer Electronics regarding global contact centers and customer self service management functionality. Phase 1 is specifically about a Global template for Case Management, Communities, and a webshop. The first release was in Europe and LATAM after which the call centers in India and the US followed and included data migration and call center / customer training. After the Service cloud implementation the Customer portal using Salesforce experience cloud was developed and implemented (B2B).

projects.title: GfK - FutureOps
projects.description:
Project manager and Scrum Lead role for the (Commercial Tools) CRM and Data Migration. 
The GfK SE (Gesellschaft für Konsumforschung, “Society for Consumer Research) is 
Germany’s largest market research institute and the fourth largest market research 
organization worldwide. By using innovative technologies and data sciences, GfK turns 
big data into smart data, enabling its clients to improve their competitive edge and enrich 
consumers' experiences and choices.
It involved a Salesforce development (Agile) and implementation project for (CRM) Salesforce Sales Cloud and CPQ. Both in Germany and the UK.

Project manager for the development and implementation of a custom build Risk management module using Salesforce Service Cloud at The Global Fund in Geneva Switzerland.
The Global Fund is a partnership organization (NGO) designed to accelerate the end of AIDS, tuberculosis, and malaria.

projects.title: MatcH - ABN AMRO Cloud
projects.description:
Project manager for the domains Credits & Mortgages,  Security and International Germany.
MatcH (Move Applications to the Cloud) which is about Technical Re-platforming which moved all in scope mid-range Applications hosted within the Netherlands  and Germany “as-is” (without significant functional impact) to the On-premise dedicated Cloud. Thereby it enabled the decommissioning of non-standard platforms and out of support situations. Furthermore the programme managed the decommissioning of migrated applications.
I started in Amsterdam for CISO (Security) and Credit & Mortgages, later in Frankfurt for International Germany.

projects.title: TMG - Telegraaf Media Groep (METRO) app development
projects.description:
Project manager for the development of B2E and B2C native android and iOS apps.
The apps set the new way of working at TMG for their Digital Transformation. Both in design, user experience and architecture.
The native apps were part of the complete editorial platform for newspapers (print|), websites and apps.
The first B2C app for METRO was mainly about user communication based on user proximity and location based advertisement.
The second app was a B2E app for sales.
Development was done nearshore at IBM CiC Groningen, The Netherlands.

projects.title: Mac@TMG (Telegraaf Media Groep)
projects.description: Project manager for the Mac@TMG implementation. The Mac@TMG set the new way of working at TMG for their Digital Transformation. Both in design, user experience and architecture. All required applications had to be selected, possibly modified and implemented on the new Apple platform. Beside the device rollout, all training of users on applications and new hardware (Mac and iPhone) was done internally.

projects.title: Major Consumer Electronic devices provider SmartTV Migration to Cloud
projects.description:
Project manager for the SmartTV migration to IBM SmartCloud Enterprise — IBM’s enterprise-class public cloud infrastructure-as-a-service (IaaS).

Cloud infrastructure will reduce the complexity of managing software in the TVs, provide an economic, more flexible way to create new services for viewers. Introducing cost-per-device basis, a new business model is obtained with predictable costs, and great flexibility to expand services and grow user base.
